headline: Wells Fargo Remains a Buy on S&P Global (SPGI) With a $627 PT
summary: S&P Global Inc. (NYSE:SPGI) is one of the 13 Best Long Term Growth Stocks to Invest in Right Now. In a report released on June 23, Jason Haas CFA, from Wells Fargo, maintained a Buy rating on S&P Global Inc. (NYSE:SPGI) with a price target of $627.00.
